titleStmt.title: To the most illustrious and serene prince, his royal Highness

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Salusbury, at the Sign of the Temple near Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: A verse acrostic on "William Henry Prince of Orange and Nassaw [sic]".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Sign of the Temple near Temple-Bar
